channel.title: Comments on: William Paul Charles Simpson, 17 Sep 1982 – 24 Apr 2006

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description: Thank you both (R Hallmark & Daniel Martins) for your thoughts and concern. Billy's grand father recently put together a video remembrance with pictures of him from very young to his service in the military. We miss him and think of him often.

item.title: By: Daniel Martins
item.dc:creator: Daniel Martins
item.description: I served with your brother in law here in Portugal. I love his sense of humor, and the genuine love he showed for everyone with whom he interacted in the mission field, and I´m sure he´s still spreading that love in the spiritual world!

item.title: By: R Hallmark
item.dc:creator: R Hallmark
item.description:
Mr. Scott,
My sister-in-law, Annette Hallmark, was also killed in the accident that your brother-in-law was in. I simply wish to tell you that I am sorry for your family's loss. Annette was a wonderful woman and mother, and although we find it hard to carry on without her, I find comfort in knowing this accident was, although something near infathomable for us, God's plan for these three souls, and I hope your family finds comfort in your faith and love.
